Source.Name: picocom
Source.Description: Dumb terminal emulator for serial simple, manual, modem configuration, testing, and debugging tool. It has also served (quite well) as a low-tech serial communications program to allow access to all types of devices that provide serial consoles. It could also prove useful in many other similar tasks.

Package.Name: picocom
